availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas K. Brown (Johnson and Lawrence County, KY, farmhand and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County and Lawrence County, Kentucky, farm hand and soldier. Son of Daniel G. Brown and Elizabeth Brown. Married Julina Davis Brown in Johnson County on July 3, 1865. Resident of Johnson County in 1850. Farm hand in Lawrence County in 1860. Served in the Sandy Valley Battalion of the 1st Regiment Capital Guards (U.S.A.) as a private from June 19, 1864 to March 11, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 81B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 641.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Johnson County Marriages, Film #001912950, p. 79.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 774.
